description: A Pylons application template providing a working site skeleton configured with SQLAlchemy, mako, repoe.who, ToscaWidgets, TurboMail, WebFlash and (optionally) SchemaBot. The generated app is pre-configured with authentication, login and registration forms, and (optionally) email confirmation.
longdescription: A Pylons application template providing a working site skeleton configured with SQLAlchemy, mako, repoe.who, ToscaWidgets, TurboMail, WebFlash and (optionally) SchemaBot. The generated app is pre-configured with authentication, login and registration forms, and (optionally) email confirmation.
